definition: Fenghuang county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
Fenghuang county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]

Phoenix, capital of Arizona/also 菲尼克斯[Fei1 ni2 ke4 si1]
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work

sentences.english: Hello. This is the Yanhua Fenghuang Hospital. May I see your passport please.
sentences.chinese: 您好，这里是燕化凤凰医院，请出示您的护照。

sentences.english: See small trick, the Indus to golden phoenix.

sentences.english: Derek Fisher is the president of the NBA Players' Assn . and he will attend meetings in Phoenix.
sentences.chinese: 小鱼是NBA球员协会的主席，他也将出现在凤凰城。

sentences.english: The war is resolved, the phoenix is a bird of harmony.
sentences.chinese: 又是对战争的化解，凤凰是祥和之鸟。

sentences.english: Travel southwest from Phoenix towards Yuma.
sentences.chinese: 西南地区旅行，从凤凰对尤马。

sentences.english: O'Bannon was born in Phoenix and raised on Air Force bases around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她出生在凤凰，在世界各地的空军基地成长。

sentences.english: The second part lays stress on analyzing the effect which the South Great Wall had on the ethnic cultures of FengHuang .
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，着重分析南方长城对凤凰民族文化的影响。

sentences.english: Phoenix is not CHEUNG, Kirin not swim.
We were shivering at the merciless northerly winds up on the very peak of the Phoenix Mountain.

sentences.english: It was supposed to be called "Little Phoenix" as it was his nickname.
sentences.chinese: 它被认为是所谓的“小凤凰”，因为它是他的昵称。

sentences.english: Take Bus 346 and get off at the final stop Phoenix Mountain.

sentences.english: From riches to rags, an old-fashion thing with a lot of classic movies.

sentences.english: Chicken forms part of the symbolism of the dragon and phoenix in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 鸡的一部分，象征龙和凤凰在中国文化。

sentences.english: So Xuejiadao also known as "Phoenix Islands."
sentences.chinese: 因此薛家岛又称“凤凰岛”。
